title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.27 - Termination of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.27 - Termination of service

State Regulations

The Division of Health Care Financing in the Department of Health shall be notified immediately of the deletion of any previously offered service or of the withholding of services from patients paid for by government agencies. Such notifications shall include a statement indicating the date of the deletion or withholding of such service and the cost impact on the residential health care facility of such action. Any overpayments by reason of such deletion of previously offered service shall bear interest and be subject to penalties both in the manner provided in section
86-2.7
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-2.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
